project.description: This job is to make Starhub ph2 release build from depot //OTV_OS/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV2_Maintenance/...

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo $versionnumber
echo $buildtype
echo $configtype echo $run_on_node
echo $shelved_cl
echo $P4_TICKET
echo $P4CLIENT
echo $P4USER

buildStep.command: p4 -u zwang -c $P4CLIENT login << EOF ${P4PASSWD} EOF echo "User specified a changelist, syncing to the changelist ($changelist)" p4 -c $P4CLIENT sync @$changelist

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo $changelist property_file=param.properties #cd $WORKSPACE/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV/otvtarg/sam7428_uclibc_bc #source ../set_env_bash.sh #make CONFIG_TYPE=starhub_sam7428 BUILD_TYPE=test clean #make CONFIG_TYPE=starhub_sam7428 BUILD_TYPE=test echo $P4_CHANGELIST export subfolder=$(date '+%Y%m%d-%H') echo $subfolder if [ -f "$property_file" ]; then rm param.properties fi echo "datetime=$subfolder" > param.properties
if [ -f "versionnumber.properties" ]; then rm versionnumber.properties fi echo " "

hudson.plugins.python.Python.command:
import re import os workspace=os.getenv("WORKSPACE") buildnumber=os.getenv("buildnumber") print workspace file_object = open(workspace+'/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV2_Maintenance/buildroot/package/Makefile.in') try: all_the_text = file_object.read() finally: file_object.close()
#print all_the_text #result = re.findall("BUILD_VERSION=\"(.*)\"", all_the_text) result = re.findall("BUILD_VERSION=\"(.*)\"", all_the_text) #print result[1] version='' if result: for v in result: if not "$(" in v: version=v
print version
f=file("versionnumber.properties","w+") str="versionnumber="+version print str f.writelines(str) f.close()

hudson.plugins.parameterizedtrigger.Pred.properties: emailaddress=$initiator_email buildtype=$buildtype target=$target configtype=$configtype CL=$P4_CHANGELIST buildversion=$versionnumber current_changelist=$changelist run_on_node=$NODE_NAME joburl=${BUILD_URL}console shelved_cl=$shelved_cl buildfrom=$buildfrom

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
unset PERL_MM_OPT
echo $CL #projectroot=StarHub_NFX_IPTV #target=sam7428_uclibc_bc #buildtype=release #configtype=starhub_sam7428_cso #datetime=$(date '+%Y%m%d-%H') echo $projectroot echo $target echo $buildtype echo $configtype echo $datetime echo $initiator_email echo $versionnumber echo $o_debug echo $o_trace echo $o_error echo $target echo $changelist echo $current_changelist if [ -z "$changelist" ]; then echo "changelist is empty" current_changelist=$P4_CHANGELIST else echo "changelist is not empty" current_changelist=$changelist fi echo "current changelist is $current_changelist"
ln -sf /home/swang/toolchains /home/slave_dir/workspace/Make_SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/Opentv5/toolchains ln -sf /home/swang/toolchains /home/slave_dir/workspace/Make_SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV2_Maintenance/toolchains ln -sf /home/swang/toolchains /home/slave_dir/workspace/Make_SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/Opentv5/DEVELOP/toolchains
codedir=/home/slave_dir/workspace/Make_SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV2_Maintenance/otvtarg/$target cd $codedir source ../set_env_bash.sh
echo "execute clean...." make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype clean
if [ -d $WORKSPACE/$projectroot ]; then rm -rf $WORKSPACE/$projectroot fi
if [ $buildtype = "release" ] ; then make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype image mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v1/ mkdir -p /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v1/ cd $codedir/$buildtype'_'$configtype cp -r ./images/* $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v1/ cp -r ./images/* /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v1/
cd $codedir make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype V2_IMAGE=yes image mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v2/ mkdir -p /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v2/ cd $codedir/$buildtype'_'$configtype cp -r ./images/* $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v2/ cp -r ./images/* /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images_v2/
elif [ $buildtype = "test" ] ; then make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype image mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ mkdir -p /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cd $codedir/$buildtype'_'$configtype cp -r ./images/* $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cp -r ./images/* /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cp *.img $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/ cp *.img /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/ elif [ $buildtype = "sdk" ] ; then make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype image mkdir -p $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ mkdir -p /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cd $codedir/$buildtype'_'$configtype cp -r ./images/* $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cp -r ./images/* /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/images/ cp *.img $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/ cp *.img /home/builds/$projectroot/$buildtype'_'$configtype/$BUILD_NUMBER'_cl_'$current_changelist/ fi
#cp *.img $WORKSPACE/$projectroot/$datetime/$buildtype'_'$configtype/

com.etas.jenkins.plugins.CreateTextFile..textFileContent: Initiator = $initiator_email BuildType = $buildtype ConfigType = $configtype Last cl = $P4_CHANGELIST Current CL= $changelist Build Version = $versionnumber Target = $target Machine = $NODE_NAME make_clean = $make_clean

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: echo "current changelist is ${current_changelist}" echo " BUILD_CL is ${BUILD_CL} " echo "change list is ${changelist}"
echo "current changelist is ${current_changelist}" echo " BUILD_CL is ${BUILD_CL} " echo "change list is ${changelist}"

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent: ${buildtype}_${configtype} #${BUILD_NUMBER} - $BUILD_STATUS Last change list is $P4_CHANGELIST current change list is ${BUILD_CL} Build version is $versionnumber FTP ftp://10.12.2.195/../../../builds/SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/${buildtype}_${configtype}/${BUILD_NUMBER}_cl_${BUILD_CL} Machine: $NODE_NAME shelved cl : $shelved_cl make_clean = $make_clean

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: codedir=/home/slave_dir/workspace/Make_SHBNFX_PH2_Maintenance_Build/Opentv5/DEVELOP/StarHub/NFX_IPTV2_Maintenance/otvtarg/$target cd $codedir echo "Post build action ... execute clean...." make CONFIG_TYPE=$configtype BUILD_TYPE=$buildtype clean
